sentences.sContent: Her face buried itself in his scabrous shirt.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her face buried itself in his scabrous shirt.
sentences.sCn: 她把脸埋在他那粗糙的衬衣里。

sentences.sContent: It differs in the smaller size of all parts and rufous scabrous tomentum.
sentences.sContent_eng: It differs in the smaller size of all parts and rufous scabrous tomentum.
sentences.sCn: 它在全株各部分较小和红棕色的粗糙的绒毛层的方面不同。

synos.tran: 粗糙的；难解决的；猥亵的

remMethod.val: scab(疤) + rous → 多疤的 → 粗糙的

trans.tranOther: rude or shocking, especially in a sexual way
